brief: AudioIn lets you grab the audio input from your sound card.

methods.name: play()
methods.desc: Start capturing the input stream and route it to the audio output

methods.name: start()
methods.desc:
Start the input stream without routing it to the audio output. This is useful
 if you only want to perform audio analysis based on the microphone input.

methods.name: set()
methods.desc: Sets amplitude, add and pan position with one method.

description: AudioIn lets you grab the audio input from your sound card.
